name: Immunity Defense
description:
This tower defense game is a submission for Godot Wild Jam 18 made by both Onionsandpeas and FritzyP within ten days. The game was created in Godot 3.2.

In this game, you are the body's immune system, charged with placing defenders to defeat incoming threats. The basic phases of the game are Placement and Battle, and there are options for the player in each phase. If any disease passes your defenses, you lose.
